name: Dr. Lick
description:
The ink monsters are hurt! Jump around and remove those blots.
Play at 1366x768 windowed for best results.

How To Play -
Click and drag on the ink creature (the one with the googly eyes).
Release to launch it into the air.
You must absorb all the spiky ink-blots to advance to the next level.

Made By -
Abhishek Agarwal
Abhishek Khade
Deepika Tiwari
Rajat Gupta
Ujwal Kumar
